name: Quran Content Archive
summary: An AYT file is a Quran content archive used by Ayat, a cross-platform program that allows users to study the Quran on their computer or mobile device. It stores files, including images, audio, and database files, using a proprietary form of Zip compression. AYT files are also used by King Saud University electronic Quran, the online version of Ayat.
